meanings.definition: The ability of a vehicle or structure to withstand a crash without significant damage or injury.
meanings.sent1: The crashworthiness of the car saved lives in the accident.
meanings.sent2: Automobile manufacturers prioritize crashworthiness in their designs.
meanings.sent3: The crashworthiness of the building was put to the test during the earthquake drill.
meanings.sent4: Her determination had a crashworthiness that shielded her from failure.
meanings.sent5: The crashworthiness of the helmet was evident when it protected the cyclist from harm.

meanings.definition: The quality of being designed to protect occupants in the event of a crash.
meanings.sent1: The crashworthiness of the airbag ensured the driver's safety.
meanings.sent2: When buying a car, consider the crashworthiness ratings for added security.
meanings.sent3: The crashworthiness of the umbrella was unexpectedly tested in the windy storm.
meanings.sent4: His friendship had a crashworthiness that shielded her from loneliness.
meanings.sent5: The crashworthiness of the life jacket was evident when it kept the swimmer afloat.
